title: Scrolls of Doubt
goal: Uncover historical context for the blight and Eldrin's prophesied role, through Seraphina's research, deepening the mystery.
stakes_shift: The blight is revealed to be part of a larger, ancient cycle, and Eldrin's role is not merely reactive but prophesied, adding a layer of destiny to his burden.

bridge.from_prev: Seraphina has committed to researching the blight and Eldrin's past.
bridge.to_next: The revelations about the blight's history lead to unsettling discoveries about Lord Valerius's rising influence.

sections.title: Dust and Prophecy
sections.intent: Seraphina begins her research, finding initial clues that hint at ancient warnings.

scenes.summary: Seraphina delves into forgotten texts, unearthing cryptic warnings of 'shadows that consume' and cycles of decay mirroring the blight.
scenes.outcome: Seraphina finds ancient texts describing a recurring darkness similar to the Shadow Blight.

sections.title: The Awakened One
sections.intent: Discover texts directly referencing an 'Awakened Sage' or a figure like Eldrin.

scenes.summary: Among the dusty scrolls, Seraphina discovers fragmented prophecies speaking of an 'Awakened One' destined to stand against the encroaching darkness.
scenes.outcome: Seraphina uncovers prophecies directly referencing Eldrin's role as the 'Awakened Sage'.

sections.title: A Burden of Destiny
sections.intent: Eldrin grapples with the weight of prophecy, while his allies react to this new information.

scenes.summary: Eldrin grapples with the weight of this ancient prophecy, his past actions now imbued with a larger, preordained significance.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin accepts the heavy burden of his prophesied role, cementing his commitment.
